description: Complete and efficient. A typewritting sound would be a must

No stable menu, but things that jump open and close unexpectedly, which I assume simple needs the user to understand and accept. It is simple too difficult for an old codger like me to grasp. I rate the HMI as maybe 3/10? No [Save] option found, which I think is an essential mindset for any writer/editor, though again I know the project is saved rather like most databases. Just another mind-set not honoured!
I will attempt to get used to it, and expect it is simple a steep learning/training curve! Bob harper.
Sympa, mais manque (à mon goût) d'optimisation de l'interface.
Et le lien ne parle pas du logiciel, en faisant une recherche le lien devrait être https://sourceforge.net/projects/plume-creator/.
summary: Simple, manque juste un peu de documentation

description: J'ai trouver une app meilleure, et j'arrive pas à désinstaller celle-ci! PK!
